      • load

        public java.util.List<IMeasurementVector> load​(java.lang.String fileName,
                                               java.lang.String delimiter)
                                        throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                               java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: IMainController
        Takes a structured text file as input and converts its contents to a List
        Specified by:
        load in interface IMainController
        Parameters:
        fileName - a String with the path of the file to load
        delimiter - a String that denotes the delimiter of the fields inside each line (e.g., "\t" or ",", or "|")
        Returns:
        a List with each line of the file represented as a MeasurementVector object
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when a fileName specified is not present as a file
        java.io.IOException - if sth goes wrong during the reading of the input file
        See Also:
        IMeasurementVector

                                                        java.lang.String countryName,
                                                        java.lang.String indicatorString)
                                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: IMainController
        A request to the server that selects a specific country and a specific indicator
        Specified by:
        findSingleCountryIndicator in interface IMainController
        Parameters:
        requestName - a String with the name that the request will take
        countryName - a String with the name of the country
        indicatorString - a String with the name of the indicator
        Returns:
        a new ISingleMeasureRequest with the result of the request
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the arguments is an empty string

      • findSingleCountryIndicatorYearRange

        public ISingleMeasureRequest findSingleCountryIndicatorYearRange​(java.lang.String requestName,
                                                                 java.lang.String countryName,
                                                                 java.lang.String indicatorString,
                                                                 int startYear,
                                                                 int endYear)
                                                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from interface: IMainController
        A request to the server that selects a specific country and a specific indicator for a time range The semantics of the time range are closed [startYear,endYear]
        Specified by:
        findSingleCountryIndicatorYearRange in interface IMainController
        Parameters:
        requestName - a String with the name that the request will take
        countryName - a String with the name of the country
        indicatorString - a String with the name of the indicator
        startYear - an Integer with the first year of the range that interests us (included)
        endYear - an Integer with the last year of the range that interests us (included)
        Returns:
        a new ISingleMeasureRequest with the result of the request
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the arguments is an empty string, or, end < start year
        See Also:
        ISingleMeasureRequest

      • getAllRequestNames

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getAllRequestNames()
        Description copied from interface: IMainController
        A set of strings with all the request names made so far to the server We use the term find* requests to refer to all the requests that dig up ISingleMeasureRequest from the loaded collection. The server is obliged to keep track of every find* request, and be able to return the names of these requests
        Specified by:
        getAllRequestNames in interface IMainController
        Returns:
        A set of strings with all the request names made so far to the server

        public ISingleMeasureRequest getRequestByName​(java.lang.String requestName)
        Description copied from interface: IMainController

        Specified by:
        getRequestByName in interface IMainController
        Parameters:
        requestName - A String with the request name
        Returns:
        an ISingleMeasureRequest object with the retrieved request's data; or null if the request does not exist
        See Also:
        ISingleMeasureRequest

        Description copied from interface: IMainController

        Specified by:
        getDescriptiveStats in interface IMainController

      • reportToFile

        public int reportToFile​(java.lang.String outputFilePath,
                        java.lang.String requestName,
                        java.lang.String reportType)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from interface: IMainController
        Outputs the contents of an existing request in a report file. The user needs to specify the path and the type of the report. The report type can be either text, or markdown, or html.
        Specified by:
        reportToFile in interface IMainController
        Parameters:
        outputFilePath - A String with the path of the output file
        requestName - A String with the name of the request to be reported
        reportType - A String that is either "text" for text, "md" for markdown, "html" for html
        Returns:
        an integer with the number of lines written; -1 if sth goes wrong
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if sth goes wrong during the writing of the output file
